page.title: 21Carberry Tower
page.content:
Dating back as far as the 15th century, Carberry Tower is steeped in a fascinating history, including playing host to Queen Elizabeth II. Carberry Tower lies just 8 minutes away from Edinburgh city centre. The Tower is a wonderful hotel and accommodates conferences, events, weddings and many high-profile guests. Carberry Tower is situated in 35 acres of landscaped and manicured parkland, which create scenic views and endless walks.

Formerly owned by the Church of Scotland, it now forms part of the Amazing Retreats portfolio, which also includes Spitbank Fort in the Solent
